title: Neil Woodford's last fund may also be wound up, supervisor warns
text:
Neil Woodford’s corporate supervisor has not ruled out winding up his only remaining investment fund after blocking investors’ access to the scheme following the implosion of the fund manager’s investment empire.

Link Fund Solutions barred investors from pulling their nest eggs from the Income Focus Fund the day after Mr Woodford closed the doors of the investment house he founded five years ago earlier this month.

The fund supervisor has written to investors explaining it is still exploring options for the fund, including transferring the assets into a different scheme.

It also claims to have sought advice from an independent investment research firm to help it look for potential candidates...
description: Neil Woodford’s corporate supervisor has not ruled out winding up his only remaining investment fund after blocking investors’ access to the scheme following the implosion of the fund manager’s investment empire.
